description: Defines a custom web component 'todo-topbar' for a Todo MVC application, managing the top bar UI including input, toggle all, and display updates.

classes.name: TodoTopbar
classes.description: Custom HTML element for the Todo MVC application's top bar, handling user interactions and display logic.

methods.name: toggleAll
methods.description: Dispatches 'toggle-all' event with the completed status based on toggle input.

methods.name: addItem
methods.description: Dispatches 'add-item' event with new todo item details when user adds a new todo.

methods.name: updateDisplay
methods.description: Updates the toggle input state and visibility based on current item counts and route.

methods.name: updateRoute
methods.description: Sets the current route ('active', 'completed', or default) and updates display accordingly.

methods.name: addListeners
methods.description: Adds event listeners for toggle input and key listeners.

methods.name: removeListeners
methods.description: Removes event listeners for toggle input and key listeners.

methods.name: attributeChangedCallback
methods.description: Handles attribute changes and updates display if connected.

methods.name: connectedCallback
methods.description: Initializes the component, sets up key listeners, updates display, and focuses input.

methods.name: disconnectedCallback
methods.description: Cleans up event listeners when component is disconnected.
